sect1.title: Introduction Ã KDE4
sect1.para: KDE in version 4 is a comprehensive desktop environment with a huge amount of applications written for it et also a huge amount of users. Subsequently, it is refered to KDE version 4 as KDE4, et to KDE version 3 as KDE3 to avoid confusion in the versions.

KDE3, which is also in the book, isn't maintained anylonger by the KDE development team because there is the successor in form of KDE4 out for years now. The current version is based on Qt4 et has some other conceptual innovations like the Plasmoids et Activities. For more information about this concepts go to the KDE project site at .
